medical_history.chief_complaint: Mrs M is undergoing annual screening mammograms due to her history of breast cancer and familial breast cancer.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Mrs. M had her first screening mammogram at age 50 and continues to have annual mammograms. An abnormal screening mammogram at age 87 in 2008 showed microcalcifications, requiring follow-ups which indicated a progression to a diagnosis of ductal carcinoma in situ (DCIS) in 2010.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, osteopenia, intermittent claudication diagnosed in 2010.
medical_history.family_history: Daughter died of breast cancer at age 37.
medical_history.social_history: Lives alone in her apartment and independently performs all activities of daily living.
